name: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType.FindPanelSearchOptionKey
desc: Search options for the find panel.

items.name: static let findPanelCaseInsensitiveSearch: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType.FindPanelSearchOptionKey
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the search is case-insensitive.

items.name: static let findPanelSubstringMatch: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType.FindPanelSearchOptionKey
items.desc: A number object containing the match type to use in the find panel.
